data.text: @critchstarblade @kylenabecker @AP You want an explanation?! Lack of early treatment with safe therapeutics, and deadly hospital protocols that do not treat covid, but induce death.The US has the highest death rates because they heavily sedate people who already struggle to breathe, then remdesivir, then the vent.

@AP Since this year started 2022 about 2,000 people die every day of covid-19covid-19 is still alive it turns into pneumonia that can kill you wear a mask science has shown wearing a mask save a life wearing a mask May save your life or your family maybe me don't be a politician mask

@onepartoflife @kylenabecker @AP Dr. Ezike didnt come up with the case definition of people dying of covid. I’m sure you ignore the long list of adverse side effects from the vaccine just like you ignore how they have counted covid deaths throughout the pandemic.
@onepartoflife @kylenabecker @AP what?  and what?  Dude turn twitter off
@AP Don't forget @JohnPrineMusic as he impacted millions and millions of lives and his loss was terrible.

@AP Some months back I had no way of taking care of my kids , had no job or money also struggling through the pandemic,so I decided to try Bitcoin trading with the help of @Allison_Grillo I was able to earn $50,000 now am financially stable.

@Berry43627460 @onepartoflife @kylenabecker @AP Totally ridiculous… they could not figure out the difference of people “dying OF Covid” … and people “dying WITH Covid” ? … your Doctors… makes me wonder if you can even walk and ew gum now … geesh
